title.zh-hans: 欢迎

title.default: What component(s) are you looking to setup?
title.zh-hans: 您要设置哪些组件？

choices.value: Main solution

text.default: Main solution
text.zh-hans: 主要解决方案

choices.value: Satellite solution

text.default: Satellite solution
text.zh-hans: 卫星解决方案

choices.value: Scheduler solution

text.default: Scheduler solution
text.zh-hans: 调度程序解决方案

choices.value: Security Group Setup

text.default: Security Group Setup
text.zh-hans: 安全组设置

html.default: Will collect connection information for Main solution deployment. The main solution manages and monitors metered Power Automate Desktop solutions. Normally there will be one Main solution deployment per Power Platform tenant
html.zh-hans: 将收集主解决方案部署的连接信息。主解决方案管理和监视按流量计费的 Power Automate 桌面解决方案。通常，每个Power Platform租户将有一个主解决方案部署

html.default: Will collect information required to setup a monitored Power Platform environment. Power Automate cloud flows to centralize information with the central main solution Automation Kit environment. Normally there will be multiple satellite solution deployments per Power Platform tenant
html.zh-hans: 将收集设置受监视Power Platform环境所需的信息。Power 自动化云端流，以使用中央主解决方案自动化工具包环境集中信息。通常，每个Power Platform租户将部署多个卫星解决方案

html.default: Display calendar based solution to view Power Automate Desktop flows that are triggered from a recurring cloud flow
html.zh-hans: 显示基于日历的解决方案，用于查看从定期云端流触发的 Power Automate 桌面流

html.default: Configure users / groups that should be assigned to security groups for Administration, Contribution and View permissions for Automation projects
html.zh-hans: 配置应分配给自动化项目的管理、参与和查看权限安全组的用户/组

title.zh-hans: 主要解决方案 - 先决条件

title.default: Verify that the following has been setup for the environment you will install the Automation Kit Main solution
title.zh-hans: 验证是否已为将要安装自动化工具包主解决方案的环境设置以下内容

choices.value: You have have environment administrator rights so we can enable [PowerApps component framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)

text.default: You have have environment administrator rights so we can enable [PowerApps component framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)
text.zh-hans: 您具有环境管理员权限，因此我们可以启用[PowerApps 组件框架功能](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)

choices.value: I DO NOT have environment administrator rights

text.default: I DO NOT have environment administrator rights
text.zh-hans: 我没有环境管理员权限

choices.value: The [Power Apps Component Framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature) has been enabled in the environment

text.default: The [Power Apps Component Framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature) has been enabled in the environment
text.zh-hans: 这[Power Apps 组件框架功能](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)已在环境中启用

choices.value: The [Creator Kit](https://appsource.microsoft.com/product/dynamics-365/microsoftpowercatarch.creatorkit1) has been installed in the environment

text.default: The [Creator Kit](https://appsource.microsoft.com/product/dynamics-365/microsoftpowercatarch.creatorkit1) has been installed in the environment
text.zh-hans: 这[创作者工具包](https://appsource.microsoft.com/product/dynamics-365/microsoftpowercatarch.creatorkit1)已安装在环境中

choices.value: [Install Microsoft Power Platform CLI](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/developer/cli/introduction#install-microsoft-power-platform-cli)

text.default: [Install Microsoft Power Platform CLI](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/developer/cli/introduction#install-microsoft-power-platform-cli)
text.zh-hans: [安装微软Power Platform命令行界面](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/developer/cli/introduction#install-microsoft-power-platform-cli)

choices.value: The environment DLP policy allows for following connectors [Approvals](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/approvals/), [Microsoft Dataverse](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/commondataserviceforapps/), [Office 365 Outlook](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365/), [Office 365 Users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365users/) and [Power Platform for Admins](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/powerplatformforadmins/)

text.default: The environment DLP policy allows for following connectors [Approvals](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/approvals/), [Microsoft Dataverse](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/commondataserviceforapps/), [Office 365 Outlook](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365/), [Office 365 Users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365users/) and [Power Platform for Admins](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/powerplatformforadmins/)
text.zh-hans: 环境 DLP 策略允许以下连接器[批准](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/approvals/),[微软数据节](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/commondataserviceforapps/),[Office 365 展望](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365/),[Office 365 用户](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365users/)和[面向管理员Power Platform](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/powerplatformforadmins/)

choices.value: 'Power Apps Per User', 'Per App' or 'Pays as you go' license for users who will be Administrators, Contributors or viewers of Automation Projects

text.default: 'Power Apps Per User', 'Per App' or 'Pays as you go' license for users who will be Administrators, Contributors or viewers of Automation Projects
text.zh-hans: “Power Apps 每用户”、“按应用付费”或“即用即付”许可证，适用于将成为自动化项目的管理员、参与者或查看者的用户

choices.value: Office E3 license or above for Office 365 Outlook connection used by Cloud Flow

text.default: Office E3 license or above for Office 365 Outlook connection used by Cloud Flow
text.zh-hans: 适用于 Cloud Flow 使用的 Office 365 Outlook 连接的 Office E3 许可证或更高版本

choices.value: Download of free [Power BI Desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/desktop/) or [Power BI Premium](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi-premium/) to share your dashboard inside your organization

text.default: Download of free [Power BI Desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/desktop/) or [Power BI Premium](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi-premium/) to share your dashboard inside your organization
text.zh-hans: 免费下载[Power BI Desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/desktop/)或[Power BI Premium](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi-premium/)在组织内共享仪表板

elements.visibleIf: contains({prereqTest1}, 'I DO NOT have environment administrator rights')

html.default: You will need to have have an environment admin enable PowerApps component framework feature. If you have PowerApps component framework feature enabled you do not need environment administrator rights.
html.zh-hans: 您需要启用环境管理员PowerApps 组件框架功能.如果启用了 PowerApps 组件框架功能，则不需要环境管理员权限。

elements.name: isSystemCustomizer
elements.visibleIf: contains({prereqTest1}, 'I DO NOT have environment administrator rights')

title.default: Are you a member of the System Customizer role for the environment?
title.zh-hans: 您是环境的系统定制员角色的成员吗？

elements.visibleIf: contains({prereqTest1}, 'I DO NOT have environment administrator rights') and {isSystemCustomizer} = false

html.default: You will need need to have a minimum of System Customizer to import the Automation Kit solutions
html.zh-hans: 您需要至少拥有系统定制器才能导入自动化工具包解决方案

title.zh-hans: 主要解决方案
复制实例网址

text.default: Must be a valid environment instance url like https://contoso.crm.dyanamics.com/
text.zh-hans: 必须是有效的环境实例 URL，例如[https://contoso.crm.dyanamics.com/]()

html.default: Get the instance url from http://make.powerapps.com Settings -> Session details dialog
html.zh-hans: 从中获取实例网址http://make.powerapps.com设置 -> 会话详细信息对话框

title.zh-hans: 安装主页链接 注意事项

elements.markdown: 要获取安装环境参数，请访问http://make.powerapps.com选择**主页图标**对于要安装主解决方案组件的环境

title.zh-hans: 复制安装环境主页链接

text.default: Must be a valid Power Platform environment starting with https://make.powerapps.com
text.zh-hans: 必须是Power Platform以 [https://make.powerapps.com]()

html.default: This environment could be the same environment as the CoE Kit.
html.zh-hans: 此环境可能与 CoE 工具包的环境相同。

title.zh-hans: 创造

title.default: Copy Approval Connection details page link here
title.zh-hans: 在此处复制审批连接详细信息页面链接

text.default: Must be a valid Power Platform connection link starting with https://make.powerapps.com
text.zh-hans: 必须是Power Platform以 [https://make.powerapps.com]()

html.default: ![Approvals Icon](https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/releases/v1.0.1599/1.0.1599.3017/approvals/icon.png =32x32) The Approvals connector is used to approve or deny Automation Project requests
html.zh-hans: ![审批图标]（[https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/releases/v1.0.1599/1.0.1599.3017/approvals/icon.png]()=32x32） 审批连接器用于批准或拒绝自动化项目请求

title.zh-hans: 创造

title.default: Copy Microsoft Dataverse Connection details page link here
title.zh-hans: 在此处复制微软数据节连接详细信息页面链接

text.default: Must be a valid Power Platform connection link starting with https://make.powerapps.com
text.zh-hans: 必须是Power Platform以 [https://make.powerapps.com]()

html.default: ![Dataverse Icon](https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/u/juanq/releases/v1.0.1609-localization/1.0.1609.3085/commondataserviceforapps/icon.png =32x32) The Dataverse connector is used to store your Automation Kit project and telemetry data
html.zh-hans: ![数据节图标]（[https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/u/juanq/releases/v1.0.1609-localization/1.0.1609.3085/commondataserviceforapps/icon.png]()=32x32） Dataverse 连接器用于存储自动化工具包项目和遥测数据

title.zh-hans: 创造

title.default: Copy Office 365 Outlook Connection details page link here
title.zh-hans: 在此处复制 Office 365 Outlook 连接详细信息页面链接

text.default: Must be a valid Power Platform connection link starting with https://make.powerapps.com
text.zh-hans: 必须是Power Platform以 [https://make.powerapps.com]()

html.default: ![Connector Icon](https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/releases/v1.0.1611/1.0.1611.3104/office365/icon.png =32x32) The Office 365 connector is used to send emails as part of the Automation Kit management process
html.zh-hans: ![连接器图标]（[https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/releases/v1.0.1611/1.0.1611.3104/office365/icon.png]()=32x32） Office 365 连接器用于在自动化工具包管理过程中发送电子邮件

title.zh-hans: 创造

title.default: Copy Office 365 User Connection details page link here
title.zh-hans: 在此处复制 Office 365 用户连接详细信息页面链接

text.default: Must be a valid Power Platform connection link starting with https://make.powerapps.com
text.zh-hans: 必须是Power Platform以 [https://make.powerapps.com]()

html.default: ![Connector Icon](https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/releases/v1.0.1611/1.0.1611.3104/office365users/icon.png =32x32) The Office 365 users connector is used to query user information from the Office 365 graph
html.zh-hans: ![连接器图标]（[https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/releases/v1.0.1611/1.0.1611.3104/office365users/icon.png]()=32x32） Office 365 用户连接器用于从 Office 365 图形查询用户信息

title.zh-hans: 创造

title.default: Copy Power Platform for Admins Automation Connection details page link here
title.zh-hans: 在此处复制管理员自动化连接详细信息页面链接的Power Platform

text.default: Must be a valid Power Platform connection link starting with https://make.powerapps.com
text.zh-hans: 必须是Power Platform以 [https://make.powerapps.com]()

html.default: ![Connector Icon](https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/releases/v1.0.1602/1.0.1602.3056/powerplatformforadmins/icon.png =32x32) The Power Platform for Admins Automation connector is used to query information about your deployed solutions
html.zh-hans: ![连接器图标]（[https://connectoricons-prod.azureedge.net/releases/v1.0.1602/1.0.1602.3056/powerplatformforadmins/icon.png]() =32x32） 管理员自动化连接器Power Platform用于查询有关已部署解决方案的信息

title.zh-hans: 主要解决方案 - 选项

title.default: What is the email address of the default approver?
title.zh-hans: 默认审批者的电子邮件地址是什么？

title.default: Import sample data after main solution is setup?
title.zh-hans: 设置主解决方案后导入示例数据？

html.default: Sample Corporate Goals, Automation Projects and telemetry data will be imported
html.zh-hans: 将导入示例企业目标、自动化项目和遥测数据

html.default: Only base data required for solution will be imported
html.zh-hans: 仅导入解决方案所需的基本数据

title.default: Enable Return on Investment (ROI) Power Automate cloud flow?
title.zh-hans: 启用投资回报 （ROI） 电源 自动化云端流？

html.default: The ROI cloud flow will be enabled so that complexity and ROI are calculated when Automation Projects are inserted or updated
html.zh-hans: 将启用 ROI 云端流，以便在插入或更新自动化项目时计算复杂性和 ROI

html.default: You can enable the ROI cloud flow after update
html.zh-hans: 您可以在更新后启用 ROI 云端流

title.default: Enable Approval Power Automate cloud flow?
title.zh-hans: 启用审批电源 自动化云端流？

html.default: The Approval cloud flow will be enabled so that approval requests are sent to approvers
html.zh-hans: 将启用审批云端流，以便将审批请求发送给审批者

html.default: You can enable the Approval cloud flow after update
html.zh-hans: 您可以在更新后启用审批云端流

title.default: Enable Synchronization of Automation Kit data between environments?
title.zh-hans: 是否在环境之间同步自动化工具包数据？

html.default: The Synchronization cloud flow will be enabled so data is sychronized with satellite environments
html.zh-hans: 将启用同步云端流，以便数据与卫星环境同步

html.default: You can enable the Synchronization cloud flow after update
html.zh-hans: 您可以在更新后启用同步云端流

title.zh-hans: 主要解决方案 - 安全组设置

pages.visibleIf: contains({installType}, 'Main solution') and contains({installType}, 'Security Group Setup')

title.default: Please add Automation Kit members for the Automation Administrators Security Group
title.zh-hans: 请为自动化管理员安全组添加自动化工具包成员
用户或组电子邮件地址

text.default: Value must be a valid email address
text.zh-hans: 值必须是有效的电子邮件地址

title.default: Please add Automation Kit contributors that can view and edit Automation Projects
title.zh-hans: 请添加可以查看和编辑自动化项目的自动化工具包参与者
用户或组电子邮件地址

text.default: Value must be a valid email address
text.zh-hans: 值必须是有效的电子邮件地址

title.default: Please add Automation Kit contributors that can review and view Automation Projects
title.zh-hans: 请添加可以查看和查看自动化项目的自动化工具包参与者
用户或组电子邮件地址

text.default: Value must be a valid email address
text.zh-hans: 值必须是有效的电子邮件地址

html.default: Use the download button below to obtain your main configuration file that will be used to customize your deployment
html.zh-hans: 使用下面的下载按钮获取将用于自定义部署的主配置文件

title.zh-hans: 下载结果

text.default: Download
text.zh-hans: 下载

title.zh-hans: 卫星解决方案 - 先决条件
安装版本，2023 年 4 月或更高版本？

title.default: Verify that the following has been setup for the environment you will install the Automation Kit Satellite solution
title.zh-hans: 验证是否已为将要安装自动化工具包卫星解决方案的环境设置以下内容

choices.value: You have have environment administrator rights so we can enable [PowerApps component framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)

text.default: You have have environment administrator rights so we can enable [PowerApps component framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)

choices.value: I DO NOT have environment administrator rights

text.default: I DO NOT have environment administrator rights
text.zh-hans: 我没有环境管理员权限

choices.value: The [Power Apps Component Framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature) has been enabled in the environment

text.default: The [Power Apps Component Framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature) has been enabled in the environment
text.zh-hans: 这[Power Apps 组件框架功能](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)已在环境中启用

choices.value: The [Creator Kit](https://appsource.microsoft.com/product/dynamics-365/microsoftpowercatarch.creatorkit1) has been installed in the environment

text.default: The [Creator Kit](https://appsource.microsoft.com/product/dynamics-365/microsoftpowercatarch.creatorkit1) has been installed in the environment
text.zh-hans: 这[创作者工具包](https://appsource.microsoft.com/product/dynamics-365/microsoftpowercatarch.creatorkit1)已安装在环境中

choices.value: [Install Microsoft Power Platform CLI](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/developer/cli/introduction#install-microsoft-power-platform-cli)

text.default: [Install Microsoft Power Platform CLI](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/developer/cli/introduction#install-microsoft-power-platform-cli)
text.zh-hans: [安装微软Power Platform命令行界面](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/developer/cli/introduction#install-microsoft-power-platform-cli)

choices.value: The environment DLP policy allows for the following connectors [Microsoft Dataverse](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/commondataserviceforapps/), [Microsoft Dataverse (Legacy)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/commondataservice/), [Office 365 Outlook](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365/), [Office 365 Users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365users/), [Power Automate Management](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/flowmanagement/) and [Power Platform for Admins](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/powerplatformforadmins/)

text.default: The environment DLP policy allows for the following connectors [Microsoft Dataverse](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/commondataserviceforapps/), [Microsoft Dataverse (Legacy)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/commondataservice/), [Office 365 Outlook](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365/), [Office 365 Users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365users/), [Power Automate Management](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/flowmanagement/) and [Power Platform for Admins](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/powerplatformforadmins/)

title.zh-hans: 卫星解决方案 - 环境变量/设置

html.default: Follow [Environment Variable Setup Guide](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-automate/guidance/automation-kit/setup/environment-variables) to obtain the values for the items below
html.zh-hans: 跟随[环境变量设置指南](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-automate/guidance/automation-kit/setup/environment-variables)获取以下项的值

html.default:
**NOTES:**
- To import satellite solution, the user needs Azure Key Vault role of [Key Vault Secret User](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/key-vault/general/rbac-migration#access-policies-to-azure-roles-mapping) or higher
- The Azure Key Vault (AKV) settings below should have the following format /subscriptions/{Subscription ID}/resourceGroups/{Resource Group Name}/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/{Key Vault Name}/secrets/{Secret Name}
- As the flow owner the importing user will need **Basic User** and **Service Reader**
html.zh-hans:
**笔记：**
- 若要导入卫星解决方案，用户需要 Azure 密钥保管库角色[密钥保管库机密用户](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/key-vault/general/rbac-migration#access-policies-to-azure-roles-mapping)或更高
- 下面的 Azure 密钥保管库 （AKV） 设置应具有以下格式 /订阅//资源组//providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults//秘密/
- 作为流所有者，导入用户将需要**基本用户**和**服务读取器**

html.default:
**NOTES:**
- For the April 2023 release or later Azure Key Vault is no longer required for install
-The Azure Application Id will be used to get solution artifacts in the Automation Manager
- The Application Id will be added as Application User and added to role **Desktop Flow Definition Admin**
html.zh-hans:
**笔记：**
- 对于 2023 年 4 月版本或更高版本，安装不再需要 Azure 密钥保管库
- Azure 应用程序 ID 将用于在自动化管理器中获取解决方案项目
- 应用程序 ID 将添加为应用程序用户并添加到角色**桌面流定义管理员**

html.default: Follow [Environment Variable Setup Guide](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-automate/guidance/automation-kit/setup/environment-variables) to obtain the values for the items below **except** Azure Key Vault environment variables (AKV Client Id, AKV Client SecretAKV Tenant ID Secret) which are no longer required
html.zh-hans: 跟随[环境变量设置指南](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-automate/guidance/automation-kit/setup/environment-variables)获取以下项的值**除了**不再需要的 Azure 密钥保管库环境变量（AKV 客户端 ID、AKV 客户端机密AKV 租户 ID 机密）

title.default: Tell me more about each variable
title.zh-hans: 告诉我有关每个变量的更多信息
AKV 客户端 ID 密钥

html.default: Only required for March 2023 or earlier release. Contains the value of the Azure Key Vault Url that stores the Client Id of the Azure Application
html.zh-hans: 仅 2023 年 3 月或更早版本需要。包含存储 Azure 应用程序的客户端 ID 的 Azure 密钥保管库 URL 的值

title.zh-hans: AKV 客户端密钥密钥

html.default: Only required for March 2023 or earlier release. Contains the value of the Azure Key Vault Url that stores the Client Secret of the Azure Application
html.zh-hans: 仅 2023 年 3 月或更早版本需要。包含存储 Azure 应用程序的客户端密码的 Azure 密钥保管库 URL 的值

title.zh-hans: AKV 租户 ID 机密

html.default: Only required for March 2023 or earlier release. Contains the value of the Azure Key Vault Url that stores the Tenant Id of the Azure Application
html.zh-hans: 仅 2023 年 3 月或更早版本需要。包含存储 Azure 应用程序的租户 ID 的 Azure 密钥保管库 URL 的值

title.zh-hans: 自动化 CoE 警报电子邮件收件人

html.default: The email address where operational reports and alerts should be sent to, for this environment.
html.zh-hans: 对于此环境，应将操作报告和警报发送到的电子邮件地址。

title.zh-hans: 自动化项目应用 ID

html.default: Enter the Automation Project app Id of the Power Apps that is deployed with the main solution (main environment)
html.zh-hans: 输入与主解决方案（主环境）一起部署的 Power Apps 的自动化项目应用 ID

title.zh-hans: 桌面流基本网址

html.default: Follow the steps in [Desktop flows base url steps](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-automate/guidance/automation-kit/setup/environment-variables#steps-to-get-the-desktop-flow-base-url)
html.zh-hans: 按照中的步骤操作[桌面流基本网址步骤](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-automate/guidance/automation-kit/setup/environment-variables#steps-to-get-the-desktop-flow-base-url)

title.zh-hans: 环境标识

html.default: Use Session details to find this value from current environment that you're importing into (satellite)
html.zh-hans: 使用会话详细信息从要导入到的当前环境中查找此值（卫星）

title.zh-hans: 环境名称

html.default: Display name of the current environment (satellite)
html.zh-hans: 当前环境的显示名称（卫星）

title.zh-hans: 环境区域

html.default: Region of the satellite. Can be found in the Power Platform admin center
html.zh-hans: 卫星的区域。可在Power Platform管理中心中找到

title.zh-hans: 环境唯一名称

html.default: Use Session details to find this value from the current environment that you're importing into (satellite) Also must add .crm to the end of the string. Example: unq08ed139e532b4edc8f38851fd1bb3279.crm. Please note that the extension 'crm', 'crm[x]', and more. is region dependent. See [datacenter regions](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/admin/new-datacenter-regions)
html.zh-hans: 使用会话详细信息从要导入到的当前环境中查找此值（卫星） 还必须将 .crm 添加到字符串的末尾。示例：unq08ed139e532b4edc8f38851fd1bb3279.crm。请注意，扩展名“crm”，“crm[x]'等等。取决于区域。看[数据中心区域](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/admin/new-datacenter-regions)

title.zh-hans: 环境唯一名称（自动化套件主）

html.default: Use Session details to find this value from **Main**. Also must add .crm to the end of the string. For example: unq08ed139e532b4edc8f38851fd1bb3279.crm. Please note that the extension 'crm', 'crm[x]', and more. is region dependent. [See datacenter regions](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/admin/new-datacenter-regions)
html.zh-hans: 使用会话详细信息从中查找此值**主要**.还必须将 .crm 添加到字符串的末尾。例如：unq08ed139e532b4edc8f38851fd1bb3279.crm。请注意，扩展名“crm”，“crm[x]'等等。取决于区域。[查看数据中心区域](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/admin/new-datacenter-regions)

title.zh-hans: 环境网址（卫星环境）

html.default: Open a new tab and then sign in to the [Power Platform admin center](https://aka.ms/ppac).
html.zh-hans: 打开新标签页，然后登录到[Power Platform管理中心](https://aka.ms/ppac).

title.default: Flow Session Trace Record Owner Id
title.zh-hans: 流会话跟踪记录所有者 ID

html.default: This is the UserID (GUID) from the Users table inside the satellite environment for the admin account. Select Tables under Data on the left > User > Data. Change the view to 'All columns'. Find the Auto CoE Admin account that is importing solution, and then copy the value under User.
html.zh-hans: 这是管理员帐户从属环境内的“用户”表中的用户 ID （GUID）。选择左侧“数据”>“用户>数据”下的“表”。将视图更改为“所有列”。找到正在导入解决方案的自动 CoE 管理员帐户，然后复制“用户”下的值。

title.zh-hans: 卫星解决方案 - 选项

title.default: Store the extracted Power Automate Desktop script in Dataverse?
title.zh-hans: 将提取的 Power Automate Desktop 脚本存储在 Dataverse 中？

html.default: Will store Desktop flows definition script inside the Desktop Flow Definition table. This field could contain sensitive information
html.zh-hans: 将商店桌面流定义表中的桌面流定义脚本。此字段可能包含敏感信息

html.default: Will NOT Desktop flows definition script inside the Desktop Flow Definition table. NOTE: This field could contain sensitive information
html.zh-hans: 将不桌面流定义表中的桌面流定义脚本。注意：此字段可能包含敏感信息

title.zh-hans: 启用卫星流？

html.default: Will enable Cloud flows that are included in the Automation Kit Satellite solution
html.zh-hans: 将启用自动化工具包卫星解决方案中包含的云端流

title.default: Create the Azure app id as a Dataverse Application User?
title.zh-hans: 以数据节应用程序用户身份创建 Azure 应用 ID？

html.default: From April 2023 release an later an Azure Application Id is required. You can check the created application in <a href='https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/ActiveDirectoryMenuBlade/~/RegisteredApps' target='_blank'>Azure Portal<a> for the Azure Application Id
html.zh-hans: 从 2023 年 4 月版本开始，需要更高版本的 Azure 应用程序 ID。您可以在 中检查创建的应用程序<a href='https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/ActiveDirectoryMenuBlade/~/RegisteredApps' target='_blank'>Azure Portal<a>对于 Azure 应用程序 ID

title.zh-hans: 要注册的 Azure 应用程序名称？

title.default: What is the Azure Application Id to register as Application User?
title.zh-hans: 要注册为应用程序用户的 Azure 应用程序 ID 是什么？

html.default: Use the download button below to obtain your satellite configuration file that will be used to customize your deployment
html.zh-hans: 使用下面的下载按钮获取将用于自定义部署的附属配置文件

title.zh-hans: 下载结果

text.default: Download
text.zh-hans: 下载

title.zh-hans: 调度程序解决方案 - 先决条件

title.default: Verify that the following has been setup for the environment you will install the Automation Kit Scheduler solution
title.zh-hans: 验证是否已为将要安装自动化工具包调度程序解决方案的环境设置以下内容

choices.value: You have have environment administrator rights so we can enable [PowerApps component framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)

text.default: You have have environment administrator rights so we can enable [PowerApps component framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)
text.zh-hans: 您具有环境管理员权限，因此我们可以启用[PowerApps 组件框架功能](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)

choices.value: I DO NOT have environment administrator rights

text.default: I DO NOT have environment administrator rights
text.zh-hans: 我没有环境管理员权限

choices.value: The [Power Apps Component Framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature) has been enabled in the environment

text.default: The [Power Apps Component Framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature) has been enabled in the environment
text.zh-hans: 这[Power Apps 组件框架功能](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)已在环境中启用

choices.value: The [Creator Kit](https://appsource.microsoft.com/product/dynamics-365/microsoftpowercatarch.creatorkit1) has been installed in the environment

text.default: The [Creator Kit](https://appsource.microsoft.com/product/dynamics-365/microsoftpowercatarch.creatorkit1) has been installed in the environment
text.zh-hans: 这[创作者工具包](https://appsource.microsoft.com/product/dynamics-365/microsoftpowercatarch.creatorkit1)已安装在环境中

choices.value: 'Power Apps Per User', 'Per App' or 'Pays as you go' license for users who will be Administrators, Contributors or viewers of Automation Projects

text.default: 'Power Apps Per User', 'Per App' or 'Pays as you go' license for users who will be Administrators, Contributors or viewers of Automation Projects
text.zh-hans: “Power Apps 每用户”、“按应用付费”或“即用即付”许可证，适用于将成为自动化项目的管理员、参与者或查看者的用户

elements.visibleIf: contains({prereqTest-scheduler}, 'I DO NOT have environment administrator rights')

html.default: You will need to have have an environment admin enable PowerApps component framework feature. If you have PowerApps component framework feature enabled you do not need environment administrator rights.
html.zh-hans: 您需要启用环境管理员PowerApps 组件框架功能.如果启用了 PowerApps 组件框架功能，则不需要环境管理员权限。

elements.name: isSystemCustomizer
elements.visibleIf: contains({prereqTest-scheduler}, 'I DO NOT have environment administrator rights')

title.default: Are you a member of the System Customizer role for the environment?
title.zh-hans: 您是环境的系统定制员角色的成员吗？

elements.visibleIf: contains({prereqTest-scheduler}, 'I DO NOT have environment administrator rights') and {isSystemCustomizer} = false

html.default: You will need need to have a minimum of System Customizer to import the Automation Kit solution
html.zh-hans: 您需要至少具有系统定制员才能导入自动化工具包解决方案

title.zh-hans: 调度程序解决方案
下载**自动化套件调度程序_*_管理.zip**托管解决方案来自[https://github.com/microsoft/powercat-automation-kit/releases](https://github.com/microsoft/powercat-automation-kit/releases)
[导入解决方案](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/maker/data-platform/import-update-export-solutions)进入环境。
